channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: 🆕 ADDED Graph app permission
item.description:
Id: e1d2136d-eaaf-427a-a7db-f97dbe847c27
Display name: EngagementConversation.Migration.All
Description: Read and write all Viva Engage conversations
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/e1d2136d-eaaf-427a-a7db-f97dbe847c27

item.title: 🆕 ADDED Graph app permission
item.description:
Id: 30614864-4114-45ef-bdd9-0dd7894a1cc4
Display name: EngagementRole.Read.All
Description: Read all Viva Engage roles and role memberships
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/30614864-4114-45ef-bdd9-0dd7894a1cc4

item.title: 🆕 ADDED Graph app permission
item.description:
Id: 3ede5358-7366-4da8-a2f7-472bf9c7cc34
Display name: EngagementRole.ReadWrite.All
Description: Modify Viva Engage role membership
Link: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/directoryRoleTemplates/3ede5358-7366-4da8-a2f7-472bf9c7cc34

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 4e9b8407-af2e-495b-ae54-bb60a55b1b5a
Display name: Chamber Admin
Description: Lets you manage everything under your Modeling and Simulation Workbench chamber.
Link: https://management.azure.com/4e9b8407-af2e-495b-ae54-bb60a55b1b5a?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ❌ REMOVED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 4447db05-44ed-4da3-ae60-6cbece780e32
Display name: Chamber User
Description: Lets you view everything under your Modeling and Simulation Workbench chamber, but not make any changes.
Link: https://management.azure.com/4447db05-44ed-4da3-ae60-6cbece780e32?api-version=2022-04-01
